text: Nganigaŵa masengo genu kwajongola ŵanganyao, nambo kuti Allah ni jwaakun’jongolaga jwansachile. Sano mu chambone chilichose chachintole basi (ukoto wakwe) wenu mwachimisyene, ni ngankutolaga ikaŵeje pakusachilila Ngope ja Allah, sano mu chambone chilichose chachintole, chichilipidwa kukwenu mwakwanila, soni ŵanganyammwe ngasin'ja kutendedwa lupuso
